Lightweight_Housing.name: Lightweight Housing
Lightweight_Housing.description: Durable, lightweight enclosure for the system.

embodiment.description: High-density polyethylene for durability and light weight.

physics_models.name: Mass Calculation
physics_models.coding_directives: density is material density, volume is the housing volume.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_mass(density, volume):
    return density * volume
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the mass of the housing based on material density and volume.

Lightweight_Housing.verification_plan: Measure the mass of the housing and compare with requirements.
